issue.title: Some headers ( ModelDatabase.hh ) are not exported when compiling from source v.2.2

content.raw:
That's strange; I see ModelDatabase.hh in the `gazebo/common` subfolder. With the deb installed, it's at:
~~~
/usr/include/gazebo-2.2/gazebo/common/ModelDatabase.hh
~~~
I see it in a similar location when installing from source.

It's included in the list of headers in [gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/7b6a7251c3448b1083f0d0aba75cef2ab622f846/gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt?at=default#cl-75)
content.html:
That's strange; I see ModelDatabase.hh in the gazebo/common subfolder. With the deb installed, it's at:

/usr/include/gazebo-2.2/gazebo/common/ModelDatabase.hh

I see it in a similar location when installing from source.

It's included in the list of headers in gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt
